translation: Btḥqyq ashi haz kvr tohyhi ʿṭa ya rsvl Allah khyri kthyr, yʿny setthah khyr. )dunyahuk khyr thi yʿne dynuk baqy rvzun aslamuk setthah trqy labn byyhi ākhrtuk khyr thi yʿne qurbuk thd mrtbh th thd drjhi. Hrgah akh frznd tuhnd yymhi ʿālmh gvv yth petth tuhnd dshmn khosh chih spdmt mgr tvhụ̄ mah spdiv tamhi sintụ̄ ghmgyn th nakhosh, kyazi ashi kvr tohyhi tamhi khoth bhtr fẓl th nʿmt ʿṭa yth nh nihayithe chhi kunhi. Byyhi kvr ashi ʿṭa tohyhi ḥvẓi kvthr ākhrts andr aakh talavh aakh, yth mtʿlq ḥdyth shryf chuh mtfq ʿlyh, frmvv ḥẓrt rsvli krymv (ḥavẓiy masiyrah shahr) myvn ḥvẓ chuh akhi ryth kis msafts brabr (dhavaayaahu savaaʿ) tmikụ̄ and th kinarh chhi brabr prth ṭrfh (maaohu abyaẓu min allbani variyḥuhu aṭyabu mina almiski va kyzaanuh kanjuvmi alsmaaʿi) āb tmyuk chuh dod khoth zyadh sfyd. Nafh khoth ycz khoshbv. Tmikụ̄ lvtth chhi tyitụ̄ yyitụ̄ āsmankụ̄ starh (man yshrabu minhaa falaa yaẓmau aabadaan) yus akhah tmyuk āb chyyhi ts lghi nh zanhh trysh.)

Ps yimn nʿmtn hndis shukrs andr priv tvhụ̄ nemaz mḥẓ pnnis prvrdgarh sndi khạṭr. Kyazi bjn nʿmtn hndis shkrs andr gczihh bdd ʿbadt ada krnụ̄ so bdd ʿbadt gyhi nemaz. Tkmyli shkr khạṭr gczhi ath bdny ʿbadts yʿny nemazi sintụ̄ mạly ʿbadt thi ada krnụ̄ suh gvv qrban krun.

Pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ tuhnd dushmn chuh abtr, lttụ̄ czvtt yʿne be nam v nshan. (kyazi tim chhi mʿbvdi brḥqs vrạe byyan chyzn hnz ʿbadt th prstish kran. Byyhi chih tas vrạe byyan mkhlvqn hndyn navan petth tihund qurb th nzdyky ḥaṣl krnh khaṭr dhbḥ th qrban vghạrh kran. )
